description: Put all dirty bath towels, beach towels, hand towels, and wash cloths in a pile in each bathroom.
Empty the refrigerator of any perishable items.
Clean all dishes and/or place them in the dishwasher before leaving.
Turn the thermostat up to 79 â€“ help us conserve energy while the house is unoccupied.
Ensure you have all your personal belongings.
Ensure all doors are locked after exiting the home.
If anything got damaged during your stay, please let us know so we can correct it for the next guest.
Please leave us a review on Airbnb! We hope you had a great experience at Vista Monte Mar and look forward to hosting you again soon.
